mapper.insert: insert into fund_purchase_transaction (code, application_date, transaction_date, confirmation_date, settlement_date, amount, fee, nav, share, trading_platform, status, mark) values (#{code}, #{applicationDate}, #{transactionDate}, #{confirmationDate}, #{settlementDate}, #{amount}, #{fee}, #{nav}, #{share}, #{tradingPlatform}, #{status}, #{mark})
mapper.select: select code, application_date, transaction_date, confirmation_date, settlement_date, amount, fee, nav, share, trading_platform, status, mark from fund_purchase_transaction where status = #{status} order by code, settlement_date

select code, application_date, transaction_date, confirmation_date, settlement_date, amount, fee, nav, share, trading_platform, status, mark from fund_purchase_transaction where nav is null or share is null
